item.title: Empanadas for Everyone: Sofia Vergara’s ‘Latin Culinary Brand’ TOMA Now Available at Walmart
item.description: First unveiled last summer, the brand is now available at Walmart with two varieties of empanadas, pandebono (Colombian cheese bread) and ham croquetas.
